section.name: Component 1 - Ferret
section.p: The ferret is solely responsible for seeking out, downloading and managing the timeliness of all resources.

Responsibilities include:
Keeping data up-to-date
Validating documents

section.name: Component 2 - Librarian
section.p: The librarian is responsible for indexing and providing access to data (from an internal point of view). The user will typically only see another front-end bolted onto the the front of the librarian

Responsibilities include:
Submitting jobs to the indexing engine (which is within the librarian)
Indexing

section.name: Component 3 - Presentation
section.p: The presentation layer is responsible for providing an http front end to the data contained within the Overlord.

Responsibilities include:
Web front end
Web service interface
Several raw interfaces
